name: 1v1 Minecraft parkour
description:
Description:

This is a fighting game where pigs, bees and tnts are guns. There are 10 diffrent levels consisting of various blocks like sand, stone, grass and ground.  You can alose encounter some trees there. 

You need an xbox gamepad to play with a friend. That's all you need to know. 

Good luck.

Weapons:
  • Bee gun
  • Pig gun
  • TNT
  • Explosive plate
  • Swap position
  • Creeper bazooka
  • Enderpearl
Credits:
  • Explosion sound by Blender Foundation (Big Explosion | OpenGameArt.org)
